title: The Cannon Fodder Doesn’t Want to Die - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   School Life   Shounen Ai
tags: Beastkin   Beasts   Calm Protagonist   Childhood Love   Doting Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Love at First Sight   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Lovers Reunited   Magic Beasts   Medical Knowledge   Mpreg   Royalty   Shy Characters   Survival   System Administrator   Terminal Illness   Transmigration   Transplanted Memories   Tsundere   Vampires   Werebeasts   World Hopping   Zombies
author: Humble Servant Girl   寒门丫头
description: Yu Ze was in a car accident in his original world and ended up being completely paralyzed, the doctors consider him in a vegetative state. While he can still hear what everyone around him is saying, he does not have the ability to respond. So when an AI calling itself System 02 appears in his brain, telling him he can get all functions of his body back, Yu Ze jumps at the chance. System 02 explains to him that he has to pass through several worlds as the cannon fodder who dies early. His mission is to live as these cannon fodders and survive past the original time when they die.>
